derivation: or (shortened) אַבְשָׁלוֹם ; from H1 (אָב) and H7965 (שָׁלוֹם); father of peace (i.e. friendly);
outline:
Absalom or Abishalom = "my father is peace"
  1. father-in-law of Rehoboam
  2. third son of David, killer of first-born son Amnon, also leader of revolt against his father - David
strongs_def: Abshalom, a son of David; also (the fuller form) a later Israelite
